name: Gregory's Ultimate Car Adventure
description:
An infinite runner type game I made back on December 23rd, 2021, somewhat connected to FNaF: Security Breach. Basically, you help Gregory drive the car away from the Pizza Plex, although essentially it's just an infinite car driving game.

Also avalilable on Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/gregorys-ultimate-car-adventure/713224
